jcr:content.browserTitle: Features | Adobe Flash Builder 4.5 for PHP Premium
jcr:content.metaDescription: Read latest product features of Adobe Flash Builder 4.5 for PHP Premium.
jcr:content.tagsKeywords: Video streaming, Content protection, Server management, Communication, Playback experience

text_8a35.text:
Build mobile applications
Code faster
Design-develop workflow
Large project development

text_8473.text:
Expanded platform support
Rich application design
Powerful testing tools
PHP development

text_482e.text: Use Adobe® Flash® Builder® 4.5 software to build mobile Flex and ActionScript® applications for leading mobile platforms using a common codebase.

image_f8cd.alt: Mobile app development for multiple platforms

text_81e9.text:
Mobile app development for multiple platforms
Build standalone Flex/ActionScript® applications for one or more mobile
platforms (Android™, BlackBerry®, or iOS). Design and Code views support
mobile development using mobile-ready components.

text_ff12.text:
Mobile app debugging
Debug and test applications on locally connected mobile devices or a mobile emulator.

text_2f61.text:
Mobile application packaging and signing
Deploy, package, and sign required resources as platform-specific
installer files for upload to a mobile application distribution site or
store.

image_6007.alt: Mobile apps for Android, BlackBerry Tablet OS, and iOS

text_4509.text:
Mobile apps for Android, BlackBerry Tablet OS, and iOS
Benefit from new support for mobile application development and testing,
enabling the use of a common codebase to build apps for Android™,
BlackBerry® Tablet OS, and iOS while sharing code from web applications.

text_2235.text: To the top

text_8bbc.text: Accelerate coding using powerful, improved intelligent code editing.

text_2671.text:
Metadata code completion
Benefit from metadata code completion that enhances existing content
assist functionality by providing suggestions for both Adobe Flex®
Software Development Kit (SDK) and custom metadata tags.

text_8c0f.text:
Code generation
Use QuickAssist/Fix to rename and manipulate variables, generate
getters/setters and event handlers, organize imports, and more. Use the override/implements feature to define methods from a superclass or
interface.

text_26ac.text:
Additional coding improvements
Accelerate your coding with block selection
and edit mode; next/previous subword navigation; code formatting of MXML
documents; CSS class reference content assist, navigation, and
refactoring; and more.

text_b658.text:
Customizable Flash Builder
Customize how Flash Builder generates MXML/ActionScript code using code
templates, specify trigger keys for content assist and auto-complete suggestions, and specify Flash Player versions for launch/debug.

text_6332.text:
Powerful code editing
Speed coding through syntax coloring, statement completion, code
collapse, refactoring support, live highlighting of invalid references,
and interactive step-through debugging. 

Edge caching for RTMP

Maximize your network using RTMP caching to reduce the load on your origin server and improve the quality of service for your end users. Edge caching is an easy-to-use feature that expands the RTMP capacity of your server deployment.

Edge caching for RTMP

Maximize your network using RTMP caching to reduce the load on your origin server and improve the quality of service for your end users. Edge caching is an easy-to-use feature that expands the RTMP capacity of your server deployment.

Edge caching for RTMP

Maximize your network using RTMP caching to reduce the load on your origin server and improve the quality of service for your end users. Edge caching is an easy-to-use feature that expands the RTMP capacity of your server deployment.

text_36f5.text:
Refactoring and ASDoc support
Quickly navigate through code or restructuring
by renaming all references to a class, method, or variable thanks to
refactoring support. Display comments in MXML and ActionScript editors using ASDoc.

text_5eef.text:
Data-centric development
Introspect Java, PHP, Adobe ColdFusion®, REST,
and SOAP services to display methods and properties in the new
Data/Service Explorer. Drag and drop to bind methods to user interface
components.

text_1f30.text:
Invalid reference live highlighting
See references to invalid variables, methods,
classes, and interfaces as you are typing in the code editor, and then
use the Quick Assist/Fix features to generate stub code.

text_50b8.text:
Code templates
Use over 100 best-practice code templates (aka
snippets) for ActionScript, MXML, and CSS. Review and insert templates
using code assist. Create custom templates and import or export them for
sharing within teams.

text_dfce.text:
Integrated development and debugging
Develop and debug Flash, Flex, and PHP application components in an integrated development environment.

text_4ef2.text: To the top

text_4d45.text: Speed up development by working in parallel with designers using Adobe Flash Catalyst® software.

text_e8ed.text:
Bidirectional designer/developer workflow
Take advantage of new support in Flash Builder 4.5 and Adobe Flash
Catalyst® CS5.5 software that enables designers to open, make changes
to, and save Flex projects that were either created or previously edited
in Flash Builder.

image_41f8.alt: Custom Spark components for designer skinning

text_ae23.text:
Custom Spark components for designer skinning
Rapidly prototype user interface elements and build component business
logic by creating custom Spark component classes. Then use Flash
Catalyst to convert visual artwork and skin components.

text_1d7c.text:
Roundtrip editing in Flash Catalyst
Use the new edit in Flash Catalyst feature to quickly make changes to
component skins. Changes made in Flash Catalyst CS5.5 are automatically
reflected in Flash Builder.

text_31c6.text: To the top

text_5c51.text: Work with large projects more efficiently to speed development.

text_bd1.text:
Design View improvements
Speed up development with Design View enhancements such as rendering improvements for complex projects, auto-collapse of data-binding expressions, warnings for incompatible SWCs, visual feedback for
drag/drop operations, and improved performance.

text_9f1d.text:
Improved large-application performance
See up to a 65% reduction for refactoring operations on projects with a
large number of dependent libraries, a significant reduction in memory used when profiling complex applications, and improved profiler
responsiveness.

text_37a6.text:
Command-line build
Use the command-line build capability to automate your build process.

text_7c58.text: To the top

text_f47b.text: Get the latest platform support in Flash Builder 4.5.

text_215d.text:
Updated platform support
Take advantage of new platform support for Eclipse™ 3.6 (Helios) and the standard Eclipse for Java™ distribution; the Cocoa version of Eclipse
on Mac OS X; and Adobe Flash Player 10.1, Adobe AIR 2.5, and Flex SDK
4.5.

text_fb4c.text:
New Spark components
Use powerful new Spark components in Flex SDK 4.5, including the new
Spark Datagrid, Form, and Image controls for web/desktop applications.

text_a7ea.text:
Desktop Adobe AIR applications
Build, debug, package, and sign AIR applications. Adobe AIR lets you quickly develop rich Internet applications (RIAs) for the desktop with the same skills and codebase you use to build RIAs for the browser.

text_96be.text: To the top

text_e7d3.text: Lay out and customize expressive user interface behaviors and controls.

text_4e11.text:
Rich visual layout
Visually design and preview user interface layout, appearance, and
behavior using a rich library of built-in components. Extend the
built-in Flex framework components or create new ones as needed.

text_ed68.text:
Interactive data visualization
Create data dashboards and interactive data
analysis by dragging and dropping a chart type and linking it to a data
source. Use the powerful Advanced Datagrid to enable users to explore
complex data.

text_40de.text:
Skinning and styling
Customize application appearance using CSS and
graphical property editors. Set commonly used properties and preview
the results in Design View. Browse themes and apply them to projects
with the Theme Browser.

text_5966.text:
Superior user experience
Differentiate your data-driven PHP applications with superior user experiences.

text_3ad7.text: To the top

text_3a2e.text: Optimize application performance and troubleshoot bottlenecks.

text_1e5c.text:
Memory and performance profilers
Accelerate application performance using memory and performance
profilers that monitor and analyze memory consumption and CPU cycles.

text_8f4f.text:
Functional testing support
Get support for automated functional testing tools such as HP QuickTest
Professional and FlexMonkey. Automate functional testing using the Flex unit testing framework.

text_2ad.text:
Network Monitor
Generate a detailed audit trail of all data passed between the local Flex application and the back end, assisting with debugging and performance tuning.

text_3a0f.text: To the top

text_86ff.text: Speed up development using Flash Builder with Zend Studio software thanks to integrated Flex/PHP tooling.

text_ca73.text:
Integrated copy of Zend Studio 8
Create Flex/PHP projects using a wizard, introspect PHP classes, and debug using the integrated debugger. Develop, test, and debug faster; troubleshoot issues quickly; and improve team collaboration.

text_d626.text:
Quick problem finding and resolution
Benefit from comprehensive PHP and JavaScript debugging, PHP profiling, built-in PHP unit testing, and Zend Server
integration for seamless application monitoring and troubleshooting.

text_e419.text:
PHP developer collaboration
Improve collaboration between project members with the robust, team-oriented PHP development features in Zend Studio.

text_7998.text:
Learning
Flex Test Drive
Flex Test Drive for Mobile
Explore what Flex can do
Free online Flex training
Benefits of RIAs
